metadata.description:
To be a butterfly, one must tear apart the cocoons of the life!
These cocoons are sometimes so twisted that the boredom rests deeply in the single cells of the body, and human being thinks that the freedom is impossible.
But flying like a butterfly is for one who never loses his hope.

~Actor: ZARIN 
~Makeup: CNA 
~Light: REZAMZF
~Light Assistant: BEHNAM
~Makeup Assistant: MALIH

[Photographer, Director, and Producer: H, N. OMID]


∎Technical Specifications 
⦁Style: Staged Photography 
⦁Size: 6240 * 4160 PIXEL 
⦁Resolution: 300 DPI 
⦁Year: 2022
